title: Account Transfer on Patch day
body: Im trying to transfer my account to the NA server but the client just sits at "Please wait while we process your transaction."  dialogue when I try to transfer. Could it be stuck because the NA server is on patch day even though they've finished patching? Do I just have to wait for a day before trying again?

replies.body:
I'd probably recommend submitting a ticket to support for that one, sounds like it's having a hiccup somewhere. So long as you have the RP on your account and transfers aren't down for some reason they should be able to either work out why it's not working and make it not do that, or transfer you manually.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Turns out the problem was the two regions were on different patches. I just had to wait before they were in sync before I could transfer. I was wrong, NA in fact did not finish patching. They did not even start the patch yet but after they finished I was able to transfer. Thanks
Ahaha well glad it worked out. Usually a region wouldn't be available in the transfer list if they aren't on the same patch so it's still a bit strange, but at least it worked out.
